org.name: Care Quality Commission
org.desc: We monitor, inspect and regulate health and social care services to make sure they meet fundamental standards of quality and safety.

essential: good organisational skills, ability to prioritise and meet deadlines
history of using IT, management information systems and software packages
experience of working in a fast-paced environment
desirable: GCSE (preferably Maths & English) or Business Admin NVQ L2 or equivalent
ability to present complex information in an accessible format
knowledge or experience of the Health and Social Care sector and/or CQC responsibilities

role_desc: You’ll deliver high quality business support to the CQC’s directorates, working with colleagues and external customers to provide an efficient and effective service.
responsibilities: provide support at key meetings, recording action points
maintain records and systems (eg databases, workflow tools, distribution lists)
assist with the production of team newsletters and introduction packs
support procurement processes and invoice reconciliation
organise own work in line with business needs and priorities
update programme logs (eg risks, covalent, issues, change)
support planning and delivery of business area events and corporate days
benefits: For successful candidates, pension schemes are available
Annual leave allowance of 25 days rising to 30 after five years
9 bank/public holidays, including Queen’s birthday privilege day
